Driver:  1114_1337 I-driver

Select a WSDL file, go through Web service client scenario, choose to "test the 
Web service".

On the Web Services Test Page, use combo drop-down to select the Web Service 
Explorer, click Finish would result in the error:

Plug-in org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption was unable to load class

This same scenario works in M8.

If this cannot be fixed in M9, then it needs to be documented.

Driver:  I20051116_2235.

When trying to use the Launch button to launch the WSE from the Web Services 
Test Page at the end of the service scenario flow, I got an "IWAB0213E Error in 
starting server", the detail message was:

IWAB0213E Error in starting server.
    java.lang.NullPointerException
    at 
org.eclipse.jst.ws.internal.consumption.common.WebServiceStartServerRegistry.get

Created an attachment (id=30255)
Possible patch to this bug

This is an interim patch for development purposes - not tested, and probably
not final.

Created an attachment (id=30263)
Patch fix to org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui.

This appears to resolve the problem. The only difference with the previous
patch (which also worked in a sniff test) is that this new patch also removes
some unused fields resulting from the removal of the unnecessary calls to the
StartProjectCommand class.
Kathy, as discussed, please commit/release this bug and bug 108575. Thanks much.
Patches committed and released to I build as v2005118_1654.
